mangaName: Doryoku Shisugita Sekai Saikyou no Butouka ha, Mahou Sekai wo Yoyuu de Ikinuku
alternativeNames: The World's Strongest Fighter Who Tried Too Hard Living a life of leisure in a world of magic
Сильнейший в мире боец, который слишком усердно пытался провести досуг в волшебном мире
努力しすぎた世界最強の武闘家は、魔法世界を余裕で生き抜く。
너무 노력한 세계최강의 무투가는 마법세계를 여유롭게 살아간다
author: WANKOSOBA
description:
That attack isn't magic, it's physics…

One day, a martial artist named Ash was suddenly reborn into another world. He decided that he will become a sorcerer in his second life. He went through harsh training after becoming the apprentice of the former hero, Morris. Then, the "Emperor of Darkness" suddenly appeared! Right when the end of the world was approaching, he one-shot the Demon Lord?!
